title: Start
body:
Ah, long time no see. Good evening, Vincent!
[[Hello! What are you up to?|#1]]
[[<<Inventory.Has(Hat)>>Look, the birds took your hat off the tree|#6]]

My hat got blown away by the wind, and I can't reach it now. 
[[Oh, that's unfortunate|#2]]

It really is. This hat is a gift from an old friend of mine, and even if it scraffy - i like it a lot
[[Maybe we can use something long to take it off?|#3]]
[[What if we ask someone to help us?|#4]]

I tried, but I still couldn't come up with anything that long
[[I'll see if I can find something suitable|#5]]

Someone that tall you mean? I do have an giraffe friend, but she leaves far, far away from here - I doubt she can be much of a help to us
[[I'll see what I can do|#5]]
Thank you so much, I appreciate it!

Thank you so much for asking them, you did me a great favor! 
[[No problem|#7]]

I think I'm going home now. The sky looks cloudy, and I suppose you are going to keep looking for that star, right?
[[I am|#8]]

Maybe you should take my umbrella then, just in case
[[Thanks! But aren't you going to search for the star?|#9]]

What? Me? No, not at all - I'm just an old fox, and I've already had a great amount of time to try something new. I'll leave it to you, my friend
[[Oh. I think I understand|#10]]

Thank you again, Vincent, and goodbye!
[[Bye|#11]]
I hope you'll find what you are looking for!
